channel.title: How can I edit shops?
channel.description: Hello guys, i've been wondering on how to add Item's into shops..? And how can I change the price for an example a pking shop..? how can i change the price of the "Pk Points" needed.? please help me? Add me on msn or comment below. Email- Sexy_robert_manu@hotmail.co.uk Thanks!

item.title: How can I edit shops?
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“run3scap3_uk, post:1, topic:423560”]Hello guys, i’ve been wondering on how to add Item’s into shops…? And how can I change the price for an example a pking shop…? how can i change the price of the “Pk Points” needed.? please help me? Add me on msn or comment below.
Email- Sexy_robert_manu@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks![/quote]
you can change what you want in shop by going to, data,cfg,shops.cfg pick a shop and put the item id’s in
to change the price of item in a pk shop, you will need to go to shopassistant (just search for the file) and then search special and there should be a list of items just add to the list example
case 1500: return 10; this means item 1500 will cost 10 pk points.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I edit shops?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Just open shops.cfg and add the items in it but with tabs.
So example:

Shop = 1 TAB 2 TAB 2 TAB ITEMID TAB AMOUNT TAB ITEMID TAB AMOUNT TAB ITEMID TAB AMOUNT

and so on, *of course don’t type “TAB”

For prices, for a PI server just go to a text file called priz(s)es and search the itemID and change the numbers to the price u want.
For a delta go into item.cfg and change the 3 first numbers into the prize u want it to be.
The 3 numbers are selling, buying and alching price I think. Not sure which one is which.

Read full topic
